movements.name: Pass through
movements.description: Couples dance through each other, ladies in the centre L to L, and turn clockwise in place (4 bars). They dance back through each other, ladies in the centre R shoulder to R shoulder, turn inwards to face centre (4 bars).

movements.name: Advance and retire twice
movements.description: With R hand in R.

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: Ladies dance across to the gent on their R and swing with him (waltz hold), ending facing centre and on the R of this gent.

movements.name: Circle
movements.description: All take hands in a circle and advance and retire twice.

movements.name: Swing partners
movements.description: Ladies dance back to their own partners and all swing.

movements.name: Advance, retire once
movements.description: R in R.

movements.name: Ladies cross over
movements.description: Ladies dance 2 steps across to the opposite gent and swing him one turn with waltz hold.

movements.name: Wheel in line
movements.description: With gent's R arm still around new partner's waist, ladies take R hands in the centre and all four wheel clockwise in line back to the gent's place.

movements.name: Ladies Chain
movements.description: R hands in the centre, L arm to turn the opposite gent in place, R hands again in the centre and L arm to turn their own partner.

movements.name: Swing opposites
movements.description: 1st gent and 2nd lady dance in to face each other (2 bars). They swing, separate, and drop back between the couple to the L of their own place. Each line of three takes crossed hand hold behind with outside hands resting on the hip of the outside dancer.

movements.name: Singletons Advance, retire twice
movements.description: 2nd gent and 1st lady advance and retire twice while the trios dance in place.

movements.name: Trios Advance, retire twice
movements.description: While the singletons dance in place.

movements.name: Swing partners
movements.description: All couples reform (2 bars) and swing.
With 2nd gent and 1st lady doing the swing and 1st gent and 2nd lady as singletons.
With 1st gent and 2nd lady doing the swing and 2nd gent and 1st lady as singletons.
With 2nd gent and 1st lady doing the swing and 1st gent and 2nd lady as singletons.

movements.name: House & Double, Clap & Stamp
movements.description: House across to the opposite place, dancing the hornpipe step (2 bars), then double the step back to place: hop 1, hop 2, hop 3, hop 4 (2 bars). Gents cross, L to L, to turn in and face the opposite ladies (2 bars). Clap three times (1 bar) and stamp four times 1-2, 3, 4 (1 bar).

movements.name: House & Double, Clap & Stamp
movements.description: House across to the opposite place, dancing the hornpipe step (2 bars), then double the step back to place: hop 1, hop 2, hop 3, hop 4 (2 bars). Gents cross, L to L, to turn in and face the opposite ladies (2 bars). Clap three times (1 bar) and stamp four times 1-2, 3, 4 (1 bar).

movements.name: House & Double, Clap & Stamp
movements.description: House across to the opposite place, dancing the hornpipe step (2 bars), then double the step back to place: hop 1, hop 2, hop 3, hop 4 (2 bars). Gents cross, L to L, to turn in and face the opposite ladies (2 bars). Clap three times (1 bar) and stamp four times 1-2, 3, 4 (1 bar).

movements.name: House & Double, Clap & Stamp
movements.description: House across to the opposite place, dancing the hornpipe step (2 bars), then double the step back to place: hop 1, hop 2, hop 3, hop 4 (2 bars). Gents cross, L to L, to turn in and face the opposite ladies (2 bars). Clap three times (1 bar) and stamp four times 1-2, 3, 4 (1 bar).

movements.name: House & Double
movements.description: With own partners.

movements.name: Long Lead around
movements.description: With waist hold, all couples dance 2 steps into the next place and dance 2 steps in place.  They repeat this sequence into each place and dance the last 2 steps at home.

movements.name: Slide and change
movements.description: Couples slide 2 steps to the centre and 2 steps back (4 bars) then house across to the opposite place (4 bars). They repeat the movement back to place.

movements.name: Ladies chain
movements.description: R hands in the centre, L arm to turn the opposite gent, R hands in the centre, turn partners L hand to end facing anti-clockwise around the set holding L hands in front and R hands behind.

movements.name: Long Lead around
movements.description: All holding L hands in front and R hands behind.

movements.name: Change partners
movements.description: Gents dance 1 step into the centre of the set and 1 step to turn ¼ turn R to face anti-clockwise around the set.  At the same time, ladies dance 2 steps on to the next gent on their R and new partners take waist hold (2 bars). Couples lead around back to the gent's place (6 bars).
